channel.title: 317 Client / 508 Looks (mostly)
channel.description:
I say mostly because it is not 100%, i didnt even complete with the models because of all of the re-animating.
EDIT: If someone would like to Dl it and give me a new pic to upload, I will gladly put it on my website so the pic is not deleted, my current computer is not suited to run a client. Or i would get a new pic myself.
Features:
[ul][*]Character User+Pass Saving/Loading [*]Custom Interfaces Enabled [*]Model Preloading (not .gz it loads .dat, model ID's can be up to 50k, as long as its over 15k) [*]Custom Stances/Attacks for GS's [*]Map Pre-loading (for custom maps) [*]4 HP Bars + Option of HP Left/Max numbers over HP bar [*]Much Much more, just look...[/ul]
Custom Interfaces, 508 models, colors in chatbox. [img]http://programas.site11.com/Upload/uploads/1260789771.png[/img]
Credits: (no percentages since i hate that) SilentCJ (base cache) Dylan (some models) Skittle385 (client) CoonHunter (my own skills on hard-coding and editing)
DL: http://uppit.com/v/Z7W4B8NU
If you have any questions feel free to PM me.
NOTE - The ITEM ID List is a little messed up, since its from a WAY previous version of this client, but most of the ID's in it should work fine.
